title: Pixel xl stuck on google screen and cannot load the recovery screen (Power+volume button down)
content:
I tried below,

1. Holding power button for a minute
2. Unsuccessful in going to recovery mode after holding power and volume down button. Able to reach the options screen but when I select recovery mode option or restart  bootloader option it comes back to google screen and gets stuck there

Please help me out If I can do anything else
